product_name: REI Faux Leather Trapper Hat - Boys'
long_description: The warm REI Faux Leather Trapper hat for boys is worthy of frigid Arctic weather or coverage after a New Year's Day polar bear dip in the lake! Faux fur lining and faux leather exterior provide classic style and warmth in cold weather. Earflaps can be snapped up or fastened under the chin.
short_description: The warm REI Faux Leather Trapper hat for boys is worthy of frigid Arctic weather or coverage after a New Year's Day polar bear dip in the lake!
